Job Title: Brand Ambassador

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Join our team as our Sales Specialist Brand Ambassador and become the driving force behind our brand's success. As a key player in our Trunk Shows events, you will be able to maximize sales opportunities and unleash the full potential that this challenge presents.We are looking for individuals who have a keen eye for sales opportunities and determination to unlock the full potential of our brand while being highly self-motivated to thrive in a sales-focused environment with a passion to take our brand to new heights.
Job descriptionMust be able to carry out the complete Trunk Shows project in the different spaces and business opportunities in the region assigned. (Country Club, Stores, Charity, Boutiques, etc.)Is responsible in your region for planning, contacting, negotiating, developing and implementing action and sales plans to improve results through different types of events.Identify new sales opportunities and develop action plans.Other assigned tasks
Job Qualifications:Ability to work both independently and in a team environment.Ability to be trained and provide expertise and be able to guide others in providing prompt and courteous customer service.Ability to develop rapport, trust and open communication that improves growth and job performance.Ability to interpret and apply company policies and procedures.Ability to establish sales objectives and performance to ensure quality and completion of work assignments.Ability to evaluate and boost one's own performance and that of others.Ability to understand and apply management principles related to budgeting, costs and personnel expenses.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Ability to stay organized and multitask professionally and efficiently, following instructions and paying attention to details.﻿Education and Experience:High School Diploma or equivalent preferredA minimum of 3 years of progressive experience in a fashion or Luxury environmentA combination of education and experience providing equivalent knowledge· Candidates must have excellent interpersonal and communication skills.· Sales experience in luxury goods/ basic knowledge of Fashion.· Independent, proactive, self-motivated and hungry to generate business.
Job Type: Full-timeSalary: Attractive package based on responsibility.Expected hours: 40 – 45 per weekCompensation package: Fixed & variable salary, travel expenses and bonus.Payment frequency: Paid monthly.Work Location: On the road

Experience Level (if available): None
